text: وَنَزَعْنَا مَا فِى صُدُورِهِم مِّنْ غِلٍّ إِخْوَٰنًا عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan Kami lenyapkan segala rasa dendam yang berada dalam hati mereka, sedang mereka merasa bersaudara duduk berhadap-hadapan di atas dipan-dipan.
